# SGLRT

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

SGLRT is a R package implementation of Sequential Generalized Likelihood Ratio Tests in [Paper].

## Installation

Currently, the package is under-construction and we do not support any installation.  

<!---You can install the released version of SGLRT from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("SGLRT")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("shinjaehyeok/SGLRT")
```
-->

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(SGLRT)
## basic example code
```
